translation.en: [voice] Vampling.
translation.zh: 半吸血鬼

translation.en: Vampling.
translation.zh: 半吸血鬼

translation.en: -[voice in dream] Vampling. -[shouts]
translation.zh: 半吸血鬼！

translation.en: Just a bad dream, Mr. Rutabaga.
translation.zh: 只是个噩梦 大头菜先生

translation.en: Gotta lay off three-spice pizzas.
translation.zh: 我不能再吃三种香料的披萨了

translation.en: Happy Birthday. Day 4,745 of my unremarkable life.
translation.zh: 生日快乐！ 我平凡的人生迎来了第4745天

translation.en: [dog] Wait for it.
translation.zh: 好戏要来了

translation.en: Rainey?
translation.zh: 雷尼？

translation.en: Rainey?
translation.zh: 雷尼？

translation.en: The first time's always the best.
translation.zh: 第一次总是最精彩的

translation.en: -Ha-ha. -[mother] Honey? Time to get up.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 该起床了 学校音乐剧的选拔赛就在今天

translation.en: The school musical auditions are today.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 该起床了 学校音乐剧的选拔赛就在今天 人类真好笑

translation.en: Ah-ha. Humans. [sneezes]
translation.zh: 人类真好笑
（异类 混血儿 猎人 半吸血鬼） （茄子！） （随便吧） （超精彩！）

translation.en: Three, two, go time.
translation.zh: 三、二 该行动了

translation.en: -[boy] Here we go. -[beeping]
translation.zh: 预备 砰

translation.en: Brah, smoke bomb? Cruel.
translation.zh: 兄弟 你居然用烟雾弹？真残忍

translation.en: My wings don't work with smoke on them.
translation.zh: 我的翅膀沾上烟就飞不起来了

translation.en: Well, that's how you catch a Hugar.
translation.zh: 半滴水兽就要这么抓

translation.en: You're gonna hunt every Blended who wants to live as a human?
translation.zh: 你要把每个想做人类的混血儿 都抓起来？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Mythics, Blendeds whatever.
translation.zh: 异类、混血儿 什么都抓

translation.en: Whoa. Hey. What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在干什么？

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Man what, are you, like, 13?
translation.zh: 天哪 你也就13岁吧？

translation.en: Go be an influencer like every other kid your age.
translation.zh: 学学你的同龄人 也去做个网红吧

translation.en: Please. The world is bigger than your phone.
translation.zh: 世界可比你的手机大多了

translation.en: Besides, I come from a long line of hunters.
translation.zh: 再说了 我来自猎人家族 我天生就是猎人

translation.en: It's what I was born to do. Capture and dispose of monsters.
translation.zh: 再说了 我来自猎人家族 我天生就是猎人 -抓捕并处置怪物是我的使命 -你没想过改行吗？

translation.en: Ever think of breaking the cycle?
translation.zh: -抓捕并处置怪物是我的使命 -你没想过改行吗？

translation.en: Huh? What do you think?
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: -[cackles] -You could be a hero.
translation.zh: 你可以做英雄

translation.en: Don't do it, man. Whoa.
translation.zh: 别这样 伙计

translation.en: [boy] It must have been the three-spice pizza.
translation.zh: 一定是三种香料的披萨捣的鬼

translation.en: Last time I had one, I dreamt I was trapped in a washing machine on spin cycle.
translation.zh: 上次吃那个 我梦见我被困在洗衣机里了

translation.en: [girl] Rainey talking? Talking! No way, no how. No dream.
translation.zh: 这次雷尼居然说话了 不可思议 莫名其妙 千真万确

translation.en: I woke up floating above my bed.
translation.zh: 我醒来的时候是悬浮在床上的

translation.en: Maybe I can fly.
translation.zh: 也许我能飞

translation.en: Sick. And come here. Check this out.
translation.zh: 太厉害了 还有 你看这个

translation.en: Nah. You're messing with me. That's obvs a filter.
translation.zh: 别想耍我 这显然是滤镜

translation.en: Argh. It was real!
translation.zh: 是真的！

translation.en: [boy] Whoa, Carmie.
translation.zh: 卡米

translation.en: See? That is what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: 看吧 我就是这个意思

translation.en: Maybe I'm a superhero.
translation.zh: 也许我是个超级英雄

translation.en: The first one without a tragic origin story.
translation.zh: -第一个没有悲惨故事的超级英雄 -卡米 别碰任何东西

translation.en: Carmie, don't touch anything. Don't kick anything.
translation.zh: -第一个没有悲惨故事的超级英雄 -卡米 别碰任何东西 也别踢东西 不能让人看见

translation.en: You can't be seen.
translation.zh: 也别踢东西 不能让人看见

translation.en: No. I want to be seen.
translation.zh: 不 我想让他们看

translation.en: Girl power. Tween excellence. Adopted kids make the world spin.
translation.zh: 女孩力量 少女风采 领养的孩子玩转世界

translation.en: I have superpowers.
translation.zh: 我有超能力

translation.en: Leanna is going to be so jelly. I'm gonna, like, crush this audition.
translation.zh: 莉安娜会嫉妒死的 我要在这次试镜中大放异彩

translation.en: And I'm maybe just going to, like, float right over her.
translation.zh: 我可能会直接悬浮在她头顶上

translation.en: There's no floating. There's no anything until we figure out what happened to you.
translation.zh: 不能悬浮 也不能用超能力 先弄清楚你怎么了再说

translation.en: Well, maybe what happened to me was so that I can finally have a thing.
translation.zh: 也许我只是突然有了一种天赋

translation.en: Superpowers.
translation.zh: 超能力

translation.en: You're not getting it.
translation.zh: 你还是不懂

translation.en: If you've been given powers, you've also been given enemies.
translation.zh: 有了超能力 就会有敌人

translation.en: It's how it works.
translation.zh: 有了超能力 就会有敌人 这是定律

translation.en: A voice in my dream did keep saying, "Vampling."
translation.zh: 我梦里确实有个声音 一直在说“半吸血鬼”

translation.en: "Vampling"?
translation.zh: 半吸血鬼？

translation.en: What does that mean? What does that mean?
translation.zh: 那是什么意思？问你呢！

translation.en: ♪ They're trying to ride my wave Got 'em coasting ♪
translation.zh: （玉兰中学 试镜日！）

translation.en: [girl] Carmela? Yay! Audition day.
translation.zh: 卡梅拉 太好了 今天是试镜日

translation.en: [gasps] Who spilt water on the floor? People, please. A little courtesy.
translation.zh: 谁在地上洒水了？拜托你们礼貌点！

translation.en: It's gonna be hazardous dancing next to her.
translation.zh: 在她旁边跳舞很危险

translation.en: As friends, Carmela, I--
translation.zh: 作为朋友 卡梅拉 我…

translation.en: Uh, she hates that name. Carm, Carmie? All good. Never Carmela.
translation.zh: 她讨厌这名字 “卡姆”和“卡米”都行 千万别叫“卡梅拉”

translation.en: I won't remember that.
translation.zh: 我可记不住

translation.en: You are, like, so brave to even audition. Like, why?
translation.zh: 你竟敢来参加试镜 为什么啊？

translation.en: Wardrobe, makeup, an audience staring at me for 90 minutes.
translation.zh: 服装 化妆 观众们还会盯着我看90分钟

translation.en: It'll be fun.
translation.zh: 肯定很好玩

translation.en: Fun?
translation.zh: 好玩？

translation.en: Really? I've been practising for months.
translation.zh: -真的吗？ -我练了好几个月呢

translation.en: Mm-hmm. Carmela, I've trained my entire life for this moment.
translation.zh: 卡梅拉 我从小训练就为了这一刻

translation.en: Not a bit of it was fun.
translation.zh: 一点都不好玩

translation.en: Acting, voice and dance lessons since I was five.
translation.zh: 我从五岁起开始学表演、声乐和舞蹈

translation.en: I won Miss Kramposki's Deli Queen pageant three years in a row.
translation.zh: 连续三年赢了 克拉波斯基女士的熟食皇后选美比赛

translation.en: Well, I can do all the TikTok dances.
translation.zh: 抖音上所有的舞蹈我都会跳

translation.en: The first parts
translation.zh: 开头的部分

translation.en: kinda. [laughs]
translation.zh: 算是会吧

translation.en: I was chosen most likely to succeed at my kindergarten graduation.
translation.zh: 我曾在幼儿园毕业典礼上 当选最有前途的学生

translation.en: Wow. That's a lot of pressure to live up to.
translation.zh: 天哪 真是让人望尘莫及

translation.en: Never, ever speak to me again.
translation.zh: 再也别跟我说话了

translation.en: Good luck. Kidding. Not kidding.
translation.zh: 祝你好运 假的 真的

translation.en: -You sure about this? -Yes. This is my moment.
translation.zh: -你确定吗？ -确定 我的机会来了

translation.en: Hi. I'm Kev.
translation.zh: 你好 我是凯夫

translation.en: Let's see what we have.
translation.zh: 看看大家的表现吧

translation.en: -Okay. Let's go. -[dance music plays]
translation.zh: 好 开始吧

translation.en: [Leanna] Don't try to follow me.
translation.zh: 别想跟上我

translation.en: [teacher] Five, six, seven, eight.
translation.zh: 五、六、七、八

translation.en: [Leanna] Excuse me.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: First cut. Back line. -Thank you. -[boy] Argh.
translation.zh: 首先被淘汰的是最后一排 谢谢参与

translation.en: And six, seven, eight.
translation.zh: 六、七、八

translation.en: [Leanna] Carmela, get behind me.
translation.zh: 卡梅拉 到我后面去

translation.en: Who pushed me?
translation.zh: 谁推我了？

translation.en: -[shouts] -She's clumsy.
translation.zh: 她笨手笨脚的

translation.en: Ever since she was a kid.
translation.zh: 从小就是

translation.en: [teacher] Okay. Final cut. Let's see who has what it takes to be in this show.
translation.zh: 好的 最后一道筛选 看看谁有资格参加演出

translation.en: -It's all good. Let's go. -[music resumes]
translation.zh: 没事 开始吧

translation.en: Let's go and see who makes the show.
translation.zh: 开始 看看谁能通过试镜

translation.en: -[zapping] -[dancers shout]
translation.zh: 快跑！

translation.en: Honestly, what were you thinking?
translation.zh: 老实说 你怎么想的？

translation.en: Mrs. Johnson, if adults knew that 98% of the time
translation.zh: 约翰逊老师 如果大人知道 这个问题的答案八成是

translation.en: the answer to that question is
translation.zh: 这个问题的答案八成是

translation.en: "I wasn't thinking," would they keep asking?
translation.zh: “我根本没想” 他们还会不停地问吗？

translation.en: I'm not playing this game with you, Carmie.
translation.zh: 我没空跟你玩这个 卡米

translation.en: Not even on your birthday.
translation.zh: 在你生日当天也不行

translation.en: Vice-Principal Chase will be with you shortly.
translation.zh: 蔡斯副校长很快就会见你的

translation.en: -We gotta go. I think I know-- -Mr. Gardner?
translation.zh: （校办公室 校长） -快走吧 我知道了… -加德纳同学

translation.en: Kev. Just Kev. What are you doing here?
translation.zh: -凯夫 叫我凯夫就好 -你来这里干什么？

translation.en: Hoping to prevent catastrophic events from occurring to my friend,
translation.zh: 尽量阻止灾难性事件降临到我的朋友

translation.en: the school, the world.
translation.zh: 学校和世界头上

translation.en: That's nice, but you're going to do it out of this office.
translation.zh: 真体贴 但是 你只能在办公室外面做 祝你愉快

translation.en: Now, Kev!
translation.zh: 快出去 凯夫！

translation.en: People always talk about nature versus nurture
translation.zh: （相信自己 自然与教养） 大家常常讨论 自然和教养哪个占主导地位

translation.en: and which one dominates.
translation.zh: 大家常常讨论 自然和教养哪个占主导地位

translation.en: What no one ever talks about is what happens when the natural order mixes with the unnatural order.
translation.zh: 但是没人说过 自然和非自然秩序混合起来会怎样

translation.en: That would be something to talk about.
translation.zh: 那才是个好话题

translation.en: When you said unnatural, did you mean supernatural?
translation.zh: 你说的非自然是超自然的意思吗？

translation.en: No idea.
translation.zh: 不知道 我脑子里的念头会脱口而出

translation.en: Things go into my brain and immediately exit my mouth.
translation.zh: 不知道 我脑子里的念头会脱口而出 大多数人都觉得奇怪 我却觉得这是天赋

translation.en: Most people say it's weird. I say it's a gift.
translation.zh: 大多数人都觉得奇怪 我却觉得这是天赋

translation.en: So, you weren't talking to that kid?
translation.zh: 你不是在跟他说话？

translation.en: I wasn't not talking to him. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 也算是跟他说的吧

translation.en: The name's Madison. Happy Birthday.
translation.zh: 我叫麦迪森 生日快乐

translation.en: How did you know it was my birthday?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道今天是我生日？

translation.en: Miss Henley?
translation.zh: 亨利同学

translation.en: Ooh. [thuds]
translation.zh: （校长室）

translation.en: I'm okay. New shoes.
translation.zh: 我没事 都怪…这双新鞋

translation.en: This isn't over.
translation.zh: 这件事还没完

translation.en: [Chase] Now, Miss Henley.
translation.zh: 进来吧 亨利同学

translation.en: Carmie.
translation.zh: 卡米

translation.en: I didn't do anything, okay? They were the ones who act--
translation.zh: 我什么都没做 是她们…

translation.en: Mmm. They say you pushed Leanna off the stage.
translation.zh: 她们说你把莉安娜推下了舞台

translation.en: [Carmie] Can we just call it circumstances outside of my control?
translation.zh: 应该说 那不是我能控制的

translation.en: I'm sure they were. Regardless, I need to put on a musical.
translation.zh: 我相信你 但是不管怎样 我都得呈现一部音乐剧

translation.en: [Carmie] Musical.
translation.zh: 音乐剧

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Let's get into it. Do some, what do they called? Rehearsals.
translation.zh: 好啊 就这么办 我们得…那叫什么来着？排练

translation.en: Bring in the audience and I'll own it. Whatever "it" is. What is "it"? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 只要有观众 我就能演好 不管是什么角色 我演什么？

translation.en: You and Leanna clearly don't get along, and that is a problem that I don't want to deal with.
translation.zh: 你和莉安娜显然合不来 我可不想处理这种矛盾

translation.en: Well, we're on the same page, and I
translation.zh: 我们想法一致 而且我…

translation.en: Especially because she is a trained singer and dancer.
translation.zh: 尤其是因为 她是训练有素的歌手和舞者

translation.en: And you, while enthusiastic, are not trained.
translation.zh: 而你徒有热情 没受过训练

translation.en: Oh, I'm trained. Yeah. Tap, jazz, hip-hop.
translation.zh: 我受过训练 踢踏舞、爵士、嘻哈

translation.en: I've been studying YouTube. Yeah, for months. I've got this.
translation.zh: 我一直在研究YouTube 已经好几个月了 我能行

translation.en: Say nothing! Say nothing.
translation.zh: 什么都别说！

translation.en: I'm sure you think so, but I have a decision to make.
translation.zh: 你肯定是这么想的 但我必须做决定

translation.en: Don't worry. We'll be fine without Leanna.
translation.zh: 别担心 没有莉安娜 我们也能演

translation.en: Not the decision I was thinking.
translation.zh: 我说的决定不是这个

translation.en: I'll let you know if you're going to be a part of the musical or not.
translation.zh: 我会通知你能否参演音乐剧的

translation.en: -Oh, but I can-- -Great. We're done.
translation.zh: -可是我能… -好了 就聊到这里

translation.en: -What? -[Kev] You didn't say anything?
translation.zh: -搞什么？ -你什么都没说吗？

translation.en: How could I? She was telling me I might've blown my chance to be in the musical.
translation.zh: 我能说什么？ 她说我可能搞砸了参演音乐剧的机会

translation.en: That's not your biggest problem.
translation.zh: -你该操心的不是这个 -真的吗？

translation.en: Really? Because I want No. I need to be in it.
translation.zh: 因为我想…不对 我必须参演

translation.en: What's wrong with one of us, the outsiders,
translation.zh: 我们这些局外人 不是很酷又没什么天赋的孩子

translation.en: slightly uncool kids, not really talented, succeeding?
translation.zh: 我们这些局外人 不是很酷又没什么天赋的孩子 就不能成功吗？

translation.en: Stop. Listen. I remember where I heard the word "Vampling".
translation.zh: 别说了 我想起来 我在哪听说过“半吸血鬼”了

translation.en: -So, it's a thing? Vampling? -Yes.
translation.zh: 真的有这个词吗？半吸血鬼？

translation.en: People just don't kick trash cans across the street.
translation.zh: 对 人是不能把垃圾桶踢到街对面的

translation.en: Adrenalin?
translation.zh: 肾上腺素？

translation.en: Doesn't explain you blasting Leanna off the stage,
translation.zh: 那也不能让你把莉安娜撞下舞台 还有悬浮 或者…

translation.en: -you floating, or -Hormones?
translation.zh: 那也不能让你把莉安娜撞下舞台 还有悬浮 或者… 是荷尔蒙

translation.en: What? I'm 13. May be possible.
translation.zh: 怎么了？我13岁了 有这个可能

translation.en: Not possible. Something in you has changed and given you these powers.
translation.zh: 不可能 你体内的某样东西变了 给了你这些力量

translation.en: Like Zendaya?
translation.zh: 就像赞达亚吗？

translation.en: She doesn't have superpowers.
translation.zh: 她没有超能力

translation.en: Really? Because if you know, you know. If you don't, you never will.
translation.zh: 真的吗？懂的都懂 不懂的人永远也不会懂

translation.en: [Kev] I'm hitting the stacks. Excellent. Who's your friend?
translation.zh: -我要去书库了 -很好 你的朋友是谁？

translation.en: It's Carmie. You've met her, like, a hundred times.
translation.zh: 是卡米 你见过她无数次了

translation.en: But always ignores me.
translation.zh: 但总是把我当空气

translation.en: Maybe, maybe not.
translation.zh: 也许是 也许不是

translation.en: Don't touch the sleeved books. Only Kev.
translation.zh: 别碰有护封的书 只有凯夫能碰

translation.en: He respects the art and he knows how to deal with tape.
translation.zh: 他尊重漫画艺术 而且会拆胶带

translation.en: You! Kid!
translation.zh: 喂 小子！

translation.en: Nice try, but back, back, back. Back, back. Stop.
translation.zh: 想得美 往后退 停

translation.en: Forward. Back Back.
translation.zh: 前进 后退

translation.en: Does this always happen?
translation.zh: 经常这样吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Okay.
translation.zh: -是的 -好吧

translation.en: Yes. Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Good. The comic returned. That's good. You? Still not good.
translation.zh: 漫画回来了 这是好事 而你呢？依然不是好孩子

translation.en: You're banned for life.
translation.zh: 你这辈子都不能再进我的店

translation.en: Now, be gone!
translation.zh: 快走吧！

translation.en: -[Carmie] I found it. -Put those down there.
translation.zh: -找到了 -快放下

translation.en: You know these are just comics, right? That's what they want you to think.
translation.zh: -你知道这些只是漫画书吧？ -他们就想让你这么想

translation.en: Who's "they"? There's always a "they" running things.
translation.zh: -“他们”是谁？ -总有“他们”在背后管事

translation.en: They have used comic books to send secret messages for a century.
translation.zh: 一个世纪以来 他们一直在用漫画书传递秘密信息

translation.en: -To who? -To them.
translation.zh: -传给谁？ -他们

translation.en: I'm not even going to ask who "them" are.
translation.zh: 我就不问细节了

translation.en: -Buck Rogers, 1929. -Okay.
translation.zh: 《巴克·罗杰斯》 1929年 好吧

translation.en: Why was it that the first rocket-ship design
translation.zh: 为什么第一艘火箭飞船的设计…

translation.en: -ever came from a comic book? -I have it.
translation.zh: -给我吧 -…出自漫画书？

translation.en: So they could get the plans across the country without anyone knowing.
translation.zh: 这是他们在全国秘密传递消息的办法

translation.en: Do you know about that? [laughs]
translation.zh: 你知道吗？当然不知道

translation.en: Of course you don't. Nobody does who doesn't read comics.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？当然不知道 不看漫画的人都不知道 找到了

translation.en: Ah. Here we go.
translation.zh: 不看漫画的人都不知道 找到了

translation.en: What's a Mythic?
translation.zh: 异类是什么？

translation.en: They're legendary monsters who came before man.
translation.zh: 就是先于人类存在的传奇怪物

translation.en: So, I'm a monster?
translation.zh: 我是个怪物？

translation.en: No. But you could be a Blended,
translation.zh: 不是 但你可能是…混血儿

translation.en: the offspring of a Mythic and a human.
translation.zh: 异类和人类的后代

translation.en: Grab me the magnifying glass.
translation.zh: 把放大镜拿过来

translation.en: Uh, super speed. Nice.
translation.zh: 超级速度 真不错

translation.en: I am going to dance circles around Leanna.
translation.zh: 我要围着莉安娜跳舞

translation.en: This is the best day of my life! [squeals]
translation.zh: 这是我人生中最美好的一天！

translation.en: Carm?
translation.zh: 卡姆

translation.en: Vampling?
translation.zh: 半吸血鬼？

translation.en: "Vampling:
translation.zh: 半吸血鬼

translation.en: "the Blended offspring of a vampire,
translation.zh: 吸血鬼的混血儿后代

translation.en: and their powers are super speed," check,
translation.zh: 拥有超级速度 符合

translation.en: "enhanced strength," check.
translation.zh: 惊人的力量 符合

translation.en: "energy blast "
translation.zh: 能量轰击 这个最棒了

translation.en: -[chuckles] The best. Check. -Yep.
translation.zh: -是的 -也符合

translation.en: -"Fly." -Fly?
translation.zh: 飞？

translation.en: Really? [gasps, thuds]
translation.zh: 飞？真的吗？

translation.en: Scratch flying. We'll put "float."
translation.zh: 划掉“飞”字 改成“悬浮”吧

translation.en: I can't be a Vampling. My parents are normal, kinda.
translation.zh: 我不可能是半吸血鬼 我的父母都很正常 算是正常

translation.en: Your bio parents? What do we even know about them?
translation.zh: 你的亲生父母呢？ 我们对他们了解多少？

translation.en: My parents adopted me when I was three months old. I have no idea.
translation.zh: 我被领养的时候只有三个月大 我对他们一无所知

translation.en: So, one of your birth parents could've been a vampire.
translation.zh: 那你的亲生父母中可能有个吸血鬼

translation.en: That's impossible.
translation.zh: 不可能

translation.en: I'd say it's pretty undeniable.
translation.zh: 这是不争的事实

translation.en: "A Vampling receives their powers on their 13th year."
translation.zh: “半吸血鬼会在13岁时获得超能力”

translation.en: Happy Birthday, by the way.
translation.zh: 对了 生日快乐

translation.en: I guess I always thought I was a little different,
translation.zh: 我一直觉得自己有点与众不同 但我从没想过自己是怪胎

translation.en: but never thought I was a freak.
translation.zh: 但我从没想过自己是怪胎

translation.en: It's my dad. I gotta go.
translation.zh: 是我爸 我先走了

translation.en: Carmie?
translation.zh: 卡米？

translation.en: You're not a freak. You're my best friend.
translation.zh: 你不是怪胎 你是我最好的朋友

translation.en: [comic store owner] So, you just moved to town?
translation.zh: 你刚搬来镇上吗？

translation.en: You always ask so many questions?
translation.zh: 你总是问那么多问题吗？

translation.en: -I just asked one. -That's a lot.
translation.zh: -我只问了一个 -太多了

translation.en: Okay. Show me what you think you have. Maybe.
translation.zh: -好吧 让我看看你的本事 -也许可以

translation.en: Is communicating a difficult thing for you?
translation.zh: 你很难跟别人沟通吗？

translation.en: Is that another question?
translation.zh: -你又问了一个问题吗？ -是的 不是

translation.en: Yes. No. Maybe. I That wasn't a question.
translation.zh: -你又问了一个问题吗？ -是的 不是 也许是 我…那不是个问题

translation.en: [clears throat] I heard you are
translation.zh: 我听说你是…

translation.en: the best at what I do.
translation.zh: 业内最厉害的人

translation.en: Hey, kiddo. You got to answer your texts.
translation.zh: 孩子 你得回短信

translation.en: I know. Sorry. I'm just distracted.
translation.zh: 我知道 对不起 我只是分心了

translation.en: Ah. Well, you want me to pick you up?
translation.zh: 要我去接你吗？

translation.en: I mean, your birthday tacos are here, and they are a-taco-ing.
translation.zh: 你的生日塔可饼做好了 就等你回来吃了

translation.en: No. I'm good. See you soon.
translation.zh: 不用接我了 等会见

translation.en: Nature-versus-nurture girl. What up?
translation.zh: 自然与教养女孩 怎么了？

translation.en: Sorry. I didn't see you. I thought someone or something
translation.zh: 抱歉 我没看到你 我以为有人或什么东西在跟踪我 可能是我弄错了

translation.en: was following me, but maybe not. I don't even know.
translation.zh: 我以为有人或什么东西在跟踪我 可能是我弄错了

translation.en: Sometimes I think people are following me when they're not,
translation.zh: 我也说不清 有时候 我会误会有人跟踪我

translation.en: and then, sometimes, people are following me
translation.zh: 我也说不清 有时候 我会误会有人跟踪我 有时候我又不能及时发觉有人跟踪我

translation.en: when I think they're not. So, I don't know.
translation.zh: 有时候我又不能及时发觉有人跟踪我

translation.en: -You always talk this fast? -Yes, I do.
translation.zh: -你的语速总是这么快吗？ -没错

translation.en: Because life goes fast and you have no idea
translation.zh: 人生短暂 谁也不知道下一秒会怎么样

translation.en: what's going to happen next, even if "next" is what you want, which in my life has never been the case
translation.zh: 即便你喜欢下一秒发生的事 那种情况很少碰到

translation.en: The name's Madison. Remember?
translation.zh: 我叫麦迪森 记得吗？

translation.en: Sorry. Carmie. Nice to officially meet you.
translation.zh: 对不起 我叫卡米 很高兴正式认识你

translation.en: My mom and I just moved here. It's her restaurant back there.
translation.zh: 我和我妈刚搬到镇上 那是我们开的餐厅

translation.en: Oh. That must be nice. You can eat whatever you want.
translation.zh: 那肯定很爽吧 想吃什么就吃什么

translation.en: -No. It doesn't work like that. -Oh.
translation.zh: 不是那样的

translation.en: Those girls you drenched at school were pretty upset.
translation.zh: 在学校里被水淋湿的女孩都气坏了

translation.en: They had a lot to say about you.
translation.zh: 她们说了很多关于你的坏话

translation.en: It's a long story.
translation.zh: 说来话长

translation.en: Well, curious minds want to know.
translation.zh: 好奇的人忍不住想知道

translation.en: Have you ever wanted to be someone special,
translation.zh: 你想过变成一个特别的人吗？

translation.en: not just an outsider looking in?
translation.zh: 而不只是一个局外人

translation.en: Well, today, I had my chance to be special, and I blew it.
translation.zh: 今天我有了那种机会 但我搞砸了

translation.en: Well, there's always second chances.
translation.zh: 机会总是有的

translation.en: Besides, being an outsider kind of makes you cooler.
translation.zh: 再说了 做个局外人会更酷

translation.en: Impossible.
translation.zh: 不可能

translation.en: Joan of Arc. Greta Thunberg. Zendaya.
translation.zh: 圣女贞德、格蕾塔·通贝里、赞达亚

translation.en: All outsiders trailblazing new paths.
translation.zh: 她们都是开辟新道路的局外人

translation.en: [Carmie] I want to be like all of them.
translation.zh: 她们都是开辟新道路的局外人 我想跟她们一样

translation.en: [Madison chuckles] Exactly.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: You get it. But what if you turned out to be someone you never thought you were?
translation.zh: 你说得对 但是假如你变成了 你从未想过的样子呢？

translation.en: That would be so dope. I hope I have that problem.
translation.zh: 那太好了 我也想有这样的烦恼

translation.en: Wait. What were we talking about?
translation.zh: 等等 你到底在说什么？

translation.en: Listen. We can't change who we are,
translation.zh: 听着 我们无法改变自己

translation.en: and when you really think about it, would you want to?
translation.zh: 仔细想想 你真的愿意改变吗？

translation.en: Did you just
translation.zh: 你刚才…

translation.en: Uh, did you did you just
translation.zh: 你刚才… 你…你是不是…怎么可能？

translation.en: How?
translation.zh: 你…你是不是…怎么可能？

translation.en: Uh, adrenalin. Lots of adrenalin.
translation.zh: 肾上腺素 全凭肾上腺素

translation.en: But what I think I just saw isn't possible.
translation.zh: 我觉得我看到了不可能的事

translation.en: Look. I have to go.
translation.zh: 我该走了

translation.en: But I mean, you just saved my life.
translation.zh: 但你救了我的命 我们能谈谈吗？

translation.en: -Can we talk about this? -No.
translation.zh: 但你救了我的命 我们能谈谈吗？ 不能 能

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 不能 能

translation.en: I don't know, okay? Uh, I can't be late.
translation.zh: 其实我也不知道 我…

translation.en: And the tacos are a-taco-ing, so
translation.zh: 我不能迟到 塔可饼还等着我呢

translation.en: [gasps] This isn't over!
translation.zh: 下次接着聊！

translation.en: -[girl 1] I would love that. -[girl 2] Okay.
translation.zh: 怎么回事？ -我愿意 -好

translation.en: -[girl 1] Yeah. -[indistinct chatter]
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: That was so sick.
translation.zh: 我也太厉害了吧！

translation.en: It's my birthday. All good.
translation.zh: 今天是我的生日 没事

translation.en: -[girls laughing] -[phone chimes]
translation.zh: （《歌剧尖牙》演员名单）

translation.en: Oh. Where am I?
translation.zh: 我在哪？

translation.en: Understudy. Understudy.
translation.zh: （替角 卡米·亨利） 替角 替角

translation.en: Understudy!
translation.zh: 替角！

translation.en: I made it kind of.
translation.zh: 我通过了！算是吧

translation.en: Hmm. Thought I'd gotten rid of all these.
translation.zh: 我以为我把这些处理掉了

translation.en: Kev? I'll be in my office. Lock up when you're all finished.
translation.zh: 凯夫 我去办公室了 你忙完了记得锁门

translation.en: -Got it. -And, uh, Kev?
translation.zh: -知道了 -还有 凯夫

translation.en: -Don't forget your phone. -[Kev] Oh.
translation.zh: 别忘了你的手机

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You really want to explain to people why you can fly?
translation.zh: 你想向大家解释你会飞的原因吗？

translation.en: I knew you could talk.
translation.zh: 我就知道你会说话

translation.en: I thought I was hearing things this morning. I always could.
translation.zh: -今天早上我还以为是幻觉 -我一直都会

translation.en: Now that you understand me, check your teeth.
translation.zh: 既然你能听懂我的话 检查一下你的牙齿吧

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Your fangs. A dead giveaway.
translation.zh: 你的尖牙 完全暴露了

translation.en: I really am a Vampling!
translation.zh: 我果然是半吸血鬼

translation.en: Pull those beauties in. Taco time!
translation.zh: 把尖牙收起来 该吃塔可饼了！

translation.en: You are going to take a lot of getting used to.
translation.zh: 你得花很多时间来适应

translation.en: [Rainey] Out of my way! Out of my way!
translation.zh: 让开

translation.en: There's my birthday girl.
translation.zh: 我的小寿星回来了

translation.en: [both] We're hungry.
translation.zh: 我们饿了

translation.en: Carmie, meet Dylan. He just moved in down the block.
translation.zh: 卡米 这是迪伦 他刚搬到这个街区

translation.en: His mom's working tonight, so I invited him for dinner.
translation.zh: 他妈今晚要上班 所以我请他来吃晚餐

translation.en: Hey, Dylan. Welcome to the neighbourhood.
translation.zh: 你好 迪伦 欢迎来到这个社区

translation.en: Happy Birthday, Carmie. Thirteen is a big year.
translation.zh: 生日快乐 卡米 13岁是很重要的一年

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: So, how was the first day of the rest of your life, honey?
translation.zh: 13岁的第一天过得怎么样？

translation.en: I believe I broke my unremarkable streak.
translation.zh: 我平凡的人生不再平凡了

translation.en: Oh. Well, birthday tacos for the birthday girl. Let's go.
translation.zh: 我平凡的人生不再平凡了 这是给小寿星准备的生日塔可饼

translation.en: [mother] Mm-hmm. Yes.
translation.zh: -开吃吧！ -好

translation.en: Dylan, why don't you sit over here with us?
translation.zh: 迪伦 跟我们一起坐这边

translation.en: So cute when so tiny.
translation.zh: 这么小的样子真可爱

translation.en: No way I'm staying in here.
translation.zh: 我不能待在这里

translation.en: You can't keep us from the humans.
translation.zh: 你不能让我们远离人类

translation.en: That kid is weird
translation.zh: 那个小子很奇怪

translation.en: but he delivers.
translation.zh: 但他本事不小

translation.en: So many more to catch.
translation.zh: 还有很多个要抓呢

translation.en: -[cackles] -Help!
translation.zh: 还有很多个要抓呢 救命！
